left: In general election of 1994,

left: This attitude was typical of Mandela's broad-mindedness, his tolerance.

left: should continue as they were,

right: 黒人プレーヤーは一人だけだったが

right: チェスター・ウィリアムズ

right: マンデラは、スプリングボックスが地方自治体を訪れ

left: and teach young black children about rugby.
